title: Application to qualified foreign corporations
context: [ยง414-482] Application to qualified foreign corporations. A foreign corporation authorized to transact business in this State on July 1, 2001 is subject to this chapter but is not required to obtain a new certificate of authority to transact business under this chapter. [L 2000, c 244, pt of ยง1] Revision Note &ldquo;July 1, 2001&rdquo; substituted for &ldquo;the effective date of this chapter&rdquo;.
